result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert D. Erickson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert D. Erickson
Current: 1334 Barron St, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 05-10-2022)
Prior: 2780 33rd St, Eau Claire, WI 54703

Cases called at 1:30 PM: 21CM656, 21CM747, 21CM778, 21CM808, 21CM849, 21CT147, 22CM23, 22CM124, 22CM134, 22CM201, 22CM285, 21CM571. Hearing held via Zoom and in person.
Defendant Robert D. Erickson in court, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Robert D. Erickson.   Attorney  in court for State of Wisconsin
Agreement has been reached. Victim/Witness statute complied with. Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
21CM656: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 4: OAR.
21CM778: Defendant pleads No Contest to an amended Count 1: Misdemeanor Retail Theft (Without Repeater).
21CM808: Defendant pleads No Contest  to Count 1: OAR.
21CM849: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 2: OAR.
21CT147: Defendant pleads No Contest  to Count 1: OAR.
22CM23: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1: OAR.
22CM201: Defendant pleads No Contest  to Count 1: OAR and Count 2: Misdemeanor Bail Jumping.
22CM285 :Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1: OAR.
Defendant is sentenced to Court Costs/surcharges on each count, including one warrant fee in 21CT147, DNA sample/surcharge. Restitution in the amount of $11.40 plus the 10% surcharge (21CM778). 
22TR143: Defendant pleads No Contest to Operator Violate Red Traffic Light and is sentenced to a forfeiture totaling $175.30.
22TR703: Defendant pleads No Contest to Display Unauthorized Vehicle Registration Plate and is sentenced to a forfeiture totaling $238.30.
22TR1156: Defendant pleads No Contest to Operating Without Insurance and is sentenced to a forfeiture totaling $200.50
Remaining charges are dismissed and read in.

Cases called at 9:37 AM: 2022CM000285, 2022CM000201, 2022CM000134, 2022CM000124, 2022CM000023, 2021CT000147, 2021CM000849, 2021CM000808, 2021CM000778, 2021CM000747, 2021CM000656.
Defendant Robert D. Erickson appeared in court, in custody with Attorney Michelle Erdman. Attorney Matthew Kirkpatrick appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Agreement has been reached. Attorney Erdman notes the Defendant will be pleading to 9 different charges.
Court orders the matters adjourned to 1:30 today. Attorney Erdman to appear via Zoom.
Plea/Sentencing: 5/9/22 at 1:30 PM.

Conditions: 
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license.

11:04 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Trenton John Piltz Mr in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Robert D. Erickson appeared by video, in custody with Attorney Zeb Patek. 
Waives reading of the complaint. Attorney Erdman is defendant's attorney in other files. 
Return 5-9-22 at 9:30 AM.
